author: Joe Scott
description:
Compare news coverage. Spot media bias. Avoid algorithms. Try Ground News today and get 40% off your subscription by going to https://ground.news/joescott
2024 was a massive year for science, and most of it, you've already forgotten. So for this video I'm taking a look back the biggest science news stories you missed (or have forgotten!)
